name: Artistic Autists
description: Living as an autistic person can be hard - not just emotionally, but also physically, and not just to that individual, but also to those who love this individual the most. Unfortunately, autism cannot be cured; it can only be assisted. Things like games and interacting with these people are particularly helpful in assisting them, and they need this. Therefore, I came up with this game in order to fill in the lost gaps of enjoyment some autistic people have with an addition to a storyline that will test their ability on decision making. These are simple games that most are familiar with, and the storyline, itself, will be easy to understand.
